info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 03 at 3:59AM CDT until April 03 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RANKIN...WESTERN SIMPSON...NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE... SOUTH CENTRAL HINDS AND COPIAH COUNTIES... At 359 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crystal Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hopewell around 410 AM CDT. Harrisville around 420 AM CDT. Union around 425 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Georgetown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
